synopsis.text: Planet Strawberry's self-proclaimed princess, Ichigo Moesaki, aspiring idol and voice actress, joins forces with the ever-cheerful child star, Rin Kohana, and the tenacious Futaba Ichinose, as they navigate the thrilling yet cutthroat world of professional voice acting. Futaba, a rookie determined to make her mark, faces the looming threat of an imminent performance assessment that could potentially terminate her budding career. As these three young talents form an unlikely alliance, they must learn to balance their personal lives, overcome industry challenges, and find their unique voices in order to succeed as esteemed voice actresses in the captivating anime, Sore ga Seiyuu!.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
